title: Online STEM Teacher Professional Development Program Based on the DECODE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Core STEM education concepts and online instructional tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Post-pandemic-focused STEM education capacity-building course: Strengthening teachers' educational technology integration and feedback-driven practical training

learning_goals: Participants enhance their ability to design online STEM lessons by applying the three stages of the DECODE model: DEmonstrations, CO-training/CO-design, and co-teaching/feedback.
Participants can co-design a STEM curriculum integrating cloud classroom tools and educational technology.
Participants develop the ability to accept and incorporate real-time feedback through co-teaching practices with peer teachers.

resources: Educational Technology Integration Web Page Access Permissions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
